summary.span: 組織會套用到其他控制項的樣式。

span.span: Organizes styles that will be applied to other controls.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可以包含任意數目的樣式物件或更具特製化的樣式物件繼承自類別。A control can contain any number of style objects, or more specialized style objects that inherit from the class. 這些應該有唯一的名稱屬性。These should have unique name properties. 然後您可以藉由在相同頁面上的其他控制項參考其屬性。You can then refer to other controls on the same page by their property. 這個類別會有任何視覺化表示。This class has no visual representation. 頁面也可以使用外部樣式表，以及數個頁面可以共用相同的外部樣式表。A page can also use an external style sheet, and several pages can share the same external style sheet. 如需有關樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱[\<樣式 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0048ce21-2c92-4377-a211-9aca9efdf748)項目和主題。For more information about styles, refer to the [\

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

The specified background color for the style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不像其他屬性，屬性不繼承自其父代。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您設定青色父控制項，子控制項上的屬性將不會繼承青色的背景色彩。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit the background color of cyan. 您必須明確設定子控制項的青色、 或您的屬性必須設定屬性的父控制項，並套用至子控制項的樣式表。You must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 這是與階層式樣式表的行為一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不適用於唯讀介面。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 您可以使用套用這個方法的所有類別的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合清除所有的樣式在集合中，或針對，它會清除集合中的所有選項。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 將欄位加入至欄位的物件清單的變更資料繫結控制項的行為，並要求您再次將資料繫結至控制項。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在頁面的樣式表會繼承在參考的使用者控制項的根層級定義的樣式表中的樣式。The style sheet on the page inherits the styles in a style sheet defined at the root level of the referenced user control. 例如，如果使用者控制項上的樣式表具有名為`Style1`，網頁可以存取`Style1`，就好像在頁面的樣式表中。For example, if the style sheet on the user control has a property named `Style1`, the page can access `Style1` as if it were in the style sheet on the page.

span.span: Introduction to the StyleSheet Control
